Trample; Training [i](Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
[i]Young Ranger [/i]– Whenever a land enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Ike, Greil's Son.
[i]Brave Aether[/i] – {U}{R}: If Ike had a counter put on him this turn, he gains flying and lifelink until end of turn.
